talk.author: did:plc:7kbrpoxrxa6cgegxrhdgihhp
talk.utter: As a non Catholic, who loves my collection of glow in the dark saints, I am just angry no one has ever paid me to write about them.

talk.author: did:plc:7kbrpoxrxa6cgegxrhdgihhp
talk.utter: I actually explained it once to a Catholic friend that our religion doesn't really come with a lot tchotchkes, and the vast array in Vatican City and church gift shops just delight me.
